name: part_014
file: tmp_【LIVEあり！ゲストあり！】holoXついに◯◯進出！？刮目せよ！我ら #SSholoX2周年 [7R2Q1xjz8eU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Transition between the song and the skit section.
MC section/Comedy skit in the desert about the budget limit.
Anniversary messages and letters from each holoX member.
Outro sequence with MV information and promotion.

subtitles.original: Don-dan-dan-dan-dan
subtitles.english: Don-dan-dan-dan-dan

subtitles.original: 実は、こっそり仕掛けをほどこしました！
subtitles.english: Actually, I secretly set something up!

subtitles.original: そろそろ効いてきたかなあ？
subtitles.english: Is it starting to take effect yet?

subtitles.original: じゃあ入れた具材を順番に言ってみよー
subtitles.english: Now, let's say the ingredients we put in, one by one!

subtitles.original: ナスーー！
subtitles.english: Eggplant!

subtitles.original: イカラーー！
subtitles.english: Squid!

subtitles.original: 辛ーー！！
subtitles.english: Spicy!!

subtitles.original: か、かっこいー！吾輩もやるー！！
subtitles.english: W-Wow, so cool! I'll do it too!!

subtitles.original: どやぁ！大成功！
subtitles.english: Tada! A huge success!

subtitles.original: 今度はみんなで、いくよー！
subtitles.english: This time, all together, let's go!

subtitles.original: ナスーー！！
subtitles.english: Eggplant!!

subtitles.original: イカラーー！！
subtitles.english: Squid!!

subtitles.original: 辛ーー！！
subtitles.english: Spicy!!

subtitles.original: マヨーー！！
subtitles.english: Mayo!!

subtitles.original: からあげーー！！
subtitles.english: Fried chicken!!

subtitles.original: オムライスーー！！
subtitles.english: Omelet rice!!

subtitles.original: ハンバーグーー！！
subtitles.english: Hamburger steak!!

subtitles.original: なんで吾輩だけちがうんだよぉぉぉぉ！！
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one who's different?!!

subtitles.original: 我らの集大成(キズナ)を示した逸品！
subtitles.english: A masterpiece showing the culmination of our bonds!

subtitles.original: 「holoXなべ」が完成☆
subtitles.english: The "holoX Nabe" is complete☆

subtitles.original: 笑顔で囲めば 心がひとつとなる
subtitles.english: When we gather with smiles, our hearts become one.

subtitles.original: これぞこそが真の仲間です (ハイ！)
subtitles.english: This right here is what true comrades are! (Hi!)

subtitles.original: SHAKE★NABE Event! ハッピーラッキー×ソリダリティ
subtitles.english: SHAKE★NABE Event! Happy Lucky x Solidarity

subtitles.original: ひとりじゃ 征服できないの！
subtitles.english: I can't conquer it alone!

subtitles.original: わっくわくの スマイルを届けて
subtitles.english: Delivering a thrilling smile

subtitles.original: この星を喰べたいんだ！おっおー！
subtitles.english: I want to eat this planet! Oh-oh!

subtitles.original: Check It！鍋 Event！(ふー！) わっちゃわちゃ ごちゃ混ぜで♪
subtitles.english: Check It! Nabe Event! (Fu-!) All mixed up in a chaotic mess♪

subtitles.original: ぷちょへんざっ みんなでJoin Join
subtitles.english: Put your hands up! Everyone, join join!

subtitles.original: あっちあっちの バイブスであふれた
subtitles.english: Overflowing with piping hot vibes

subtitles.original: 世界征服 不可能じゃないわ！
subtitles.english: World conquest is not impossible!

subtitles.original: せーの！で決めポーズ！おっおー！
subtitles.english: One, two! Strike a pose! Oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 闇！鍋会！Yummy！鍋会！
subtitles.english: Dark! Nabe party! Yummy! Nabe party!

subtitles.original: Darkness！Darkness！宴会High！High！
subtitles.english: Darkness! Darkness! Banquet High! High!

subtitles.original: Yummy！鍋会！Yummy！鍋会！
subtitles.english: Yummy! Nabe party! Yummy! Nabe party!

subtitles.original: 征服！征服！宴会 満腹！
subtitles.english: Conquest! Conquest! Full from the banquet!

subtitles.original: (Wah wah wah wah, Wah wah wah)
subtitles.english: (Wah wah wah wah, Wah wah wah)

subtitles.original: あーーー！！
subtitles.english: Aaaaah!!

subtitles.original: わぁぁぁ！！
subtitles.english: Waaaaah!!

subtitles.original: あれを見ろ！
subtitles.english: Look at that!

subtitles.original: うわぁ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: 何？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: ライブかいじょー
subtitles.english: Live Venue

subtitles.original: え、おい！ あ、待てよこれ！
subtitles.english: Eh, hey! Wait, look at this!

subtitles.original: 何て事だよ！
subtitles.english: What the heck!

subtitles.original: 我々、宇宙進出じゃなかったのか！？
subtitles.english: Weren't we supposed to be expanding into space!?

subtitles.original: いや、予算の限界です。
subtitles.english: No, it's the budget limit.

subtitles.original: えー！ 待てよ！ 予算使いすぎちゃったの！？ 今更！？
subtitles.english: Eh! Wait! You spent too much budget!? Now of all times!?

subtitles.original: 予算がないから悪いんだよ！
subtitles.english: It's because there's no budget!

subtitles.original: 何で予算ないんだよ！ふざけんなよ！
subtitles.english: Why is there no budget!? Don't mess with me!

subtitles.original: 予算で遊んでる奴がいるからだよ！ 予算返せよ！
subtitles.english: It's because someone's playing around with the budget! Give it back!

subtitles.original: 吾輩の見せ場じゃなかったのかよぉぉぉぉ！！嫌だーー！！
subtitles.english: Wasn't this supposed to be my big moment?!! Nooo!!

subtitles.original: holoX 2周年だえ!!!!!
subtitles.english: It's holoX 2nd anniversary!!!!!

subtitles.original: holoX 2周年 ありがとう!!
subtitles.english: holoX 2nd anniversary, thank you!!

subtitles.original: holoX 2周年 ありがとう! Thank you
subtitles.english: holoX 2nd anniversary, thank you! Thank you

subtitles.original: holoX 2周年だえ!!!!!
subtitles.english: It's holoX 2nd anniversary!!!!!

subtitles.original: 祝☆holoX 2周年~!!
subtitles.english: Celebration☆holoX 2nd anniversary~!!

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 誰が僕にじゃんじゃん！
subtitles.english: Ah, who's pouring for me, more and more!

subtitles.original: エンジェの分も 注文オーライ
subtitles.english: Ordering for Ange too, all right

subtitles.original: 夜なべで煮込んだ (一瞬だけにゃんこ☆コン)
subtitles.english: Stewed overnight (Meow for just a moment☆con)

subtitles.original: O・TA・NO・SHI・MI
subtitles.english: E-N-J-O-Y-M-E-N-T

subtitles.original: 集中~！完デリシャスだった具材
subtitles.english: Concentration~! The ingredients were completely delicious

subtitles.original: おーまいがー 腹へいオーライ
subtitles.english: Oh my god, hungry, all right

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃだって 五人よれば 文殊の知恵
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mess, five heads are better than one

subtitles.original: いい出汁 ダダダダ ダシも笑えば
subtitles.english: Good broth, da-da-da-da, even the broth smiles

subtitles.original: シチュ中に収めて いただきます！
subtitles.english: Keep it in the stew, let's eat!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: このあとMV公開！
subtitles.english: MV public release after this!

subtitles.original: 近日公開 秘密結社holoX 「響宴ソリダリティ~SHAKE★NABE~」 リリース記念ボイス
subtitles.english: Coming Soon: Secret Society holoX "Kyoushin Solidarity ~SHAKE★NABE~" Release Commemoration Voice

subtitles.original: この後 ホロライブ公式チャンネルでMV公開!!
subtitles.english: MV public release on the Hololive official channel after this!!
